title: Getting Started Step 4: Add Your Financial Accounts

content.html: All those goals, budgets and the investments we created needs money coming in. And the money is in your account. Time to add 'em.
To give you a head start, you have the option to synchronize with bank accounts / choose to create an account manually. BlitzBudget will keep you on track of the transactions.
Give it a nickname, and enter today's balance.
